name: Loot box Simulator (itch) (MarcusTurnerBSU)
description:
With this artefact I hope to simulate a loot box and backup my research question, 'Should loot boxes be a form of gambling?'. There will be several questions for you to fill out so I can gain an understanding of how you felt playing my loot box simulator.

How to Play:

You start off with 3 lives, you click on the chest to start the cards rolling and then you can click 'Stop Rolling'. All number and face cards get added to your collection. If you pull a Joker, you lose a live and you can re-roll. Once you have lost all your lives, you are given the chance to "buy" more lives or you can reset your collection ('Reset Collection' button). 

Disclaimer - this is not about winning, it is about whether or not you are willing to "buy" lives to carry on playing without resetting. 

I have a google form that would be appreciated if you could fill out while playing or afterwards, that would be great :)  Comments are more than welcome in the comment section below!
